price: Salomão disse: "Olharemos se disseste a verdade ou se és dos mentirosos."
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
